This this thread on an Irish weather forum http www board ie vbulletin showthread php t 2057903068 page 6 is very interesting Peter O Donnell MT Cranium is a meteorologist with his own model and he ha been extraordinarily accurate in long range forecasting for a number of year He ha given a forecast for the coming winter and see strong signal for what he indicates will be historic cold in part of America and Northern Europe This is how he doe it As always my forecast is based on a blend of traditional concept and exclusive research into index value on the assumption that at least some variability in the climate can be linked to variation in the solar system magnetic field a complex response to relatively small change in solar wind output and effect on the earth s linked atmosphere and magnetosphere This is his forecast under the profile Roger J Smith http www netweather tv forum topic 72635 the seasonal forecast thread do findComment comment 3911916 It is worth reading his summer prediction which is above it

Why is snow at this time of yr in Canada at all remarkable I know for a fact that on 9 13 1950 Lawrence County TN had a heavy snowfall My father remembered it well because mother picked that le than auspicious time to go into labor and he had to drive her about 30 mile on dirt road to get her to the hospital for my delivery That s the sort of thing that get burned into your brain till you die
